name: Shersteria
startIntroPart1: You rule over the most powerful nation in the world, the Shersterian Empire.
startIntroPart2: As the queen of the empire, you must do what you do best, take over.
declaringWar: Under the name of the Shersterian empire, you are now a colony!
defeated: We have fallen and our Queen has died in the midst of battle. We give up.
introduction: Greetings. We are the Great Shersterian Empire. Perhaps this can be benificial for both of us.
hateLetsHearIt: What must you bother our Queen with?
This best not be a waste.
hateYes: Perhaps we must reconsider our distrust.
afterPeace: You are exhausted? Fine, you may exist for a while longer.
tradeRequest: We have a deal you may enjoy.
